entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
